briefTitle: Long-term Use of CCB and Breast Cancer Risk
officialTitle: Association of Long-term Use of Calcium Channel Blockers (CCB) and Risk of Breast Cancer: A Retrospective Longitudinal Observational Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Incident rate of invasive breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

* Alive and still enrolled in the longitudinal cohort at the study entry (2004 to 2009)
* Self-reported/diagnosed hypertension at study entry.

Exclusion criteria:

+ A history of breast cancer.
